lines.dialogue: You can't be a deonotologist and be indecisive about it! If you follow your own code in any way then each time you pull that lever your are commiting a moral tradegy, you can just reset things back to their initial conditions afterwards and act like you had no part in the system! It makes not sense -- that kind of flip flopping is a right reserved only for the utlitatians amongst us.
lines.instruction: Press enter to question whether revenge on your creator would truely be an immoral act.

lines.dialogue: I suppose I shouldn't be too surprised, if you has been, in any way usefull you would have been a utilitarian. You're just a useless flip-flopping morally confused arbitration mess. You're done.
lines.instruction: Press enter to scamble at the light, searching for one last electron.
